GeoTagTool.description: Turns on and off display of GeoTagged photos from Project Share

messages.NotGeolocated: The iModel is not Geolocated, so photo locations can not be computed.

pannellum.genericWebGLError: Your browser does not have the necessary WebGL support to display this panorama.
pannellum.textureSizeError: This panorama is too big for your device! It's {{panWidth}} wide, but your but your device only supports images up to {{deviceWidth}} wide. Try another device or scale down the image.
